TopicTitle: [0.23.5] KerbQuake 1.21 - Reactive Camera Shakes while IVA [5/4/14]

Articles.Content:
This doesnt work in the new career mode (with budgets added). Or at least i cant get it to work.

ditto, this mod is failing in my carrer mode too, sad just found this and would love to get it to work.
Works in a clean install but my mod-heavy build throws exceptions... and occasionally works. Seeing if I can narrow it down.

ditto, this mod is failing in my carrer mode too, sad just found this and would love to get it to work.
This doesnt work in the new career mode (with budgets added). Or at least i cant get it to work.

Do you use RealChutes?

KerbQuake doesn't work if there are RealChutes on the craft. If you're using stock parachutes (without the RealChute config) it's fine. If your ship doesn't have ANY parachutes it's fine.

I've tested this on both clean installs and my mod heavy build. Anyone else care to test it?

To be specific, I was using RealChutes v1.2.1

Edited July 23, 2014 by SaSquatch

Do you use RealChutes?

KerbQuake doesn't work if there are RealChutes on the craft. If you're using stock prachutes (without the RealChute config) it's fine. If your ship doesn't have ANY parachutes it's fine.

I've tested this on both clean installs and my mod heavy build. Anyone else care to test it?

To be specific, I was using RealChutes v1.2.1

Use real chute. Must be why it doesn't work and for some reason I didn't put a chute on craft in my sandbox test. Damm real chute is a must for me.

Sir Haxington hasn't been online for awhile... or at least his kerbal profile and Github profile doesn't show activity since may. If I have some time I may take a peak at the source and see if I can at least figure out what's going on. I don't really have the time but I do really like this mod.... Unless the author reappears..... NOW.

Did it work?

Did it work?

Apparently not.

Could you make a compatibility patch for "ProbeControlRoom" that makes probe IVA's possible. It's odd to have the control room shaking. Disabling it would be a first step and finding a way to add the shake to the cameras instead would be great. The cameras are from the RasterPropMonitor mod.
I'd like to second this one. Any chance it will happen eventually? Thanks
It really would be nice to have this ability because both mods are great, just not great together.

Yeah, that's a bit annoying. So I sat down, forked KerbQuake and made an unofficial compatibility patch. Thought I might as well post it here.

Yeah, that's a bit annoying. So I sat down, forked KerbQuake and made an unofficial compatibility patch. Thought I might as well post it here.

Cool. Does your fix also help the problem with realchute parts disabling cam shake?
Great mod. This will make ksp very immersive!

Do you use RealChutes?

KerbQuake doesn't work if there are RealChutes on the craft. If you're using stock parachutes (without the RealChute config) it's fine. If your ship doesn't have ANY parachutes it's fine.

I've tested this on both clean installs and my mod heavy build. Anyone else care to test it?

To be specific, I was using RealChutes v1.2.1

Cool. Does your fix also help the problem with realchute parts disabling cam shake?

RealChute v1.2 changed the way its parachutes are handled, but I've made a new patch, so now this mod is once again compatible with RealChute.

Get it here: KerbQuake v1.2-RC-patch

This doesnt work in the new career mode (with budgets added). Or at least i cant get it to work.
ditto, this mod is failing in my carrer mode too, sad just found this and would love to get it to work.
Works in a clean install but my mod-heavy build throws exceptions... and occasionally works. Seeing if I can narrow it down.

I don't know if both your problems were related to the RealChute incompatibility, but I've tested my latest version in both sandbox and career, on bith 32-bit and 64-bit and found no bugs. If you keep having problems after installing my latest unofficial patch, please give a good description of your problem and attach your output.log from the KSP_Data folder.

I probably won't continue developing this mod (as in adding new features), but I will keep on fixings bugs.

Edited August 26, 2014 by dxdt

Made a new release optimising the realchute compability code implemented in the last update, get it here!

It's not really that vital, but more optimal is better, right?
Great mod man, congrats for the insight!
For some reason, the effects don't show up, even with the latest version of this and module manager

For some reason, the effects don't show up, even with the latest version of this and module manager

2. What other mods are you using?

3. Can you upload your output.log from the KSP_Data folder and share it, either in public or in a pm to me?

Edited September 11, 2014 by dxdt
Didn't work for me either; I used the version in the 'download here' thing on the first page of this thread.

Possible to make a feature request? I'm using pinnacle game profiler to play KSP with an xbox 360 controller with a lot of success. The maker of the profile I am using (nedal) even managed to program it it to get vibrations during staging and when SAS toggle is held down. But that's it. Is there a way to trigger pinnacle to cause vibration for each of your camshake events?
Let me just say this is a superb mod and should be part of the stock features.

Didn't work for me either; I used the version in the 'download here' thing on the first page of this thread.

Don't use that version it's dated and doesn't work with realchutes. Use this version instead.

If your problem persists when using the version I just linked to, or if you're not using realchutes and you're still experiencing troubles, please upload your output.log from the KSP_Data folder somewhere and send it to me so I can solve the problem.
